summary: so um I may have tweeted ‘Since everyone seems to be tweeting @michaelsheen : 1) thanks for being my fave in Good Omens, 2) the...
body:
so um

I may have tweeted ‘Since everyone seems to be tweeting @michaelsheen : 1) thanks for being my fave in Good Omens, 2) the bit in David Tennant’s podcast where you talk about America was far too relatable for someone (me) who misses their uni friends. I feel a bit less silly now, thank you for that.’

he may have replied ‘Thanks Louise.’

I may be dead

tags: late late show with james corden
summary:
So I was watching this
and I didn’t know (and I still don’t know) what to think about Michael’s new beard style.
I mean I guess...
body:
So I was watching this

and I didn’t know (and I still don’t know) what to think about Michael’s new beard style.

I mean I guess I like it better than the way it was before, and it’s true it does look a bit “ancient” but in my opinion it suits him.

But at the same time I definitely like him better without a beard at all.

What do you guys think ?

In any case I love his suit and its color it suits him very well.

summary:
I can’t stop thinking about that scene in episode 3 where Aziraphale is explaining 
the antichrist situation

to Gabriel Michael...
body: I can’t stop thinking about that scene in episode 3 where Aziraphale is explaining the antichrist situation to Gabriel Michael and Sandalphon, and he starts talking about Crowley and immediately starts smiling uncontrollably and he physically and mentally has to school himself to keep a straight face as he’s talking about him, and how wily he is and how he keeps him on his toes and ugh he loves Crowley so much thank you Mr. Sheen for the food

this is a good omens blog
summary: Recently I met michael sheen! I work airport security, and he had to get interviewed because the alarm went off when he walked...
question: Recently I met michael sheen! I work airport security, and he had to get interviewed because the alarm went off when he walked through the metal detector. He wouldn't tell us why, so we tightly wrapped him with cling film until he told us. Turns out he had a metal rod him his hand from breaking it when he was a kid. How wild. He waddled away, unwilling to unwrap himself. I hope his flight was safe. He seemed awfully cozy.

blog.name: countesspetofi
blog.title: Stuff I Made, and Other Stuff
blog.description: And Stuff

summary: I tried so hard to like Good Omens. I really did. I absolutely loved the book, and I've never not enjoyed Michael Sheen, and the...
body: I tried so hard to like Good Omens. I really did. I absolutely loved the book, and I’ve never not enjoyed Michael Sheen, and the production values are amazing. I really, really hoped I could learn to stomach David Tennant, or that we might get lucky and he would actually act the role instead of just generally mugging and doing silly voices and HAVEYOUNOTICEDHOWBLOODYDAVIDTENNANTIAMLATELYing. I did see him rein it in once, in Blackpool, so I know he’s capable of not ruining a production if he sets his mind to it. It’s so disappointing

reblog.comment: I tried so hard to like Good Omens. I really did. I absolutely loved the book, and I’ve never not enjoyed Michael Sheen, and the production values are amazing. I really, really hoped I could learn to stomach David Tennant, or that we might get lucky and he would actually act the role instead of just generally mugging and doing silly voices and HAVEYOUNOTICEDHOWBLOODYDAVIDTENNANTIAMLATELYing. I did see him rein it in once, in Blackpool, so I know he’s capable of not ruining a production if he sets his mind to it. It’s so disappointing

trail.content_raw: I tried so hard to like Good Omens. I really did. I absolutely loved the book, and I’ve never not enjoyed Michael Sheen, and the production values are amazing. I really, really hoped I could learn to stomach David Tennant, or that we might get lucky and he would actually act the role instead of just generally mugging and doing silly voices and HAVEYOUNOTICEDHOWBLOODYDAVIDTENNANTIAMLATELYing. I did see him rein it in once, in Blackpool, so I know he’s capable of not ruining a production if he sets his mind to it. It’s so disappointing
trail.content: I tried so hard to like Good Omens. I really did. I absolutely loved the book, and I’ve never not enjoyed Michael Sheen, and the production values are amazing. I really, really hoped I could learn to stomach David Tennant, or that we might get lucky and he would actually act the role instead of just generally mugging and doing silly voices and HAVEYOUNOTICEDHOWBLOODYDAVIDTENNANTIAMLATELYing. I did see him rein it in once, in Blackpool, so I know he’s capable of not ruining a production if he sets his mind to it. It’s so disappointing

summary: I wanna watch Masters of Sex but like...how...and also...where? I can’t find it on Netflix or Hulu. I feel like I’ve seen most...
body: I wanna watch Masters of Sex but like…how…and also…where? I can’t find it on Netflix or Hulu. I feel like I’ve seen most of Michael Sheen’s catalog of work already except Masters because it was on cable when it was airing and I’m a cheap bastard so help me maybe?

summary: Anyway... thanks to Good Omens a significant amount of people on Tumblr are now lusting after Michael Sheen - a smol man in his...
body: Anyway… thanks to Good Omens a significant amount of people on Tumblr are now lusting after Michael Sheen - a smol man in his 50s with curls and cuddle belly. My faith in humanity has been restored. We’re ending the age of bland and boring conventionally attractive dudes and enter the age of the peggable dads aka the DILPs!

summary: ‎Carpool Karaoke : Michael Sheen et Matthew Rhys
body:
‎Carpool Karaoke : Michael Sheen et Matthew Rhys

Ok here’s the link, take 20 minutes of your time and watch this it’s amazing !!

I laughed the whole time Michael is so full of joy and positivity it’s refreshing.

And they’re such good friends 👬 it’s delightful to see them together. Great chemistry.
